text: Soni mun'galagatilani Allah ni nkam'bwanganyaga ni chilichose, nombe achinangolo ŵanaŵaŵili mwatendelani yambone, kwisa soni ŵaulongo, ŵawina, masikini, jwakuŵandikana najo nyumba niali jwaulongo, jwakuŵandikana najo nyumba niali mundu nsape, n'jenu jwakutama najo imo, jwapaulendo ni (mateeka) gagapatile magasa genu gakun'dyo. Chisimu Allah ngakasaŵanonyela aŵala ŵali ŵakulikwesya ni kuliiti
